person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night.
animal_say: I know just the friend for you! There's a gentle bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and can help you unwind and get some restful sleep.

person_say: That sounds wonderful! I'd love to meet Bruno and learn some mindfulness techniques to help me sleep better.
animal_say: Fantastic! Here comes Bruno, the mindfulness master! He's ready to help you find your calm and peaceful sleep.
